product_name: DERMA EVitamin C Foaming Oil Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackAwaken your glow in minutes with DERMA Eâ€™s Vitamin C Foaming Oil Cleanser. Powered by Stabilized Vitamin C and 7 Natural Fruit and Seed Oils, this innovative oil-to-foam cleanser melts away makeup, oil, and dirt - no double cleanse necessary! Skin feels bright, refreshed, and ready to shine.
details: DetailsBenefitsStarts as an oil and lathers into a soft foam to remove makeup, oil and dirtBrightening and nourishing - cleanses skin without stripping moistureEnergizes with an uplifting scent and silky textureKey IngredientsStabilized Vitamin C: Visibly brightensNiacinamide: Supports a healthy skin barrierUnique blend of 7 Natural Fruit and Seed Oils: Nourishes and hydrates, leaving skin feeling refreshed and not strippedItem 2640139How To UseApply to damp skin. Massage in circular motions to activate the foaming lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use daily - morning and/or evening. Pair with DERMA E's Vitamin C Whipped Radiance Polish for the ultimate AM duo that energizes and revives.IngredientsSesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sorbitol, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Sorbitan Oleate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascorbic Acid, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Silica, Sodium PCA, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Squalane, Sorbitan Stearate, Lactic Acid, Purified Water, Natural Fragrance Oil.
how_to_use: Apply to damp skin. Massage in circular motions to activate the foaming lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use daily - morning and/or evening. Pair with DERMA E's Vitamin C Whipped Radiance Polish for the ultimate AM duo that energizes and revives.

faceoff_positive.comments: I really enjoyed this product. I was genuinely surprised by how smooth and clean my skin felt after using it. My makeup came off effortlessly, and it didn't leave a greasy residue. The only potential concern is that if you wear contact lenses, it may cause your eyes to blur. Therefore, it's advisable to remove your contact lenses before using the product. I would otherwise recommend and already have recommended the product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Brightening clean

faceoff_negative.comments: It's a nice, light-weight product with a pleasant texture and scent that feels clean (of toxins) and refreshing on the skin. The consistency of the foam was gentle on my skin, but acted strong enough to remove dirt and oil off my face.  My skin leans on the oily side, but can easily dry-out from harsh cleansers and my skin felt very balanced after using this product, although it wasn't necessarily glowing.  Also, the foam was a little stubborn to wash away with just my hands & water and I needed a washcloth to remove all of the cleanser from my skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Gentle, clean and refreshing
